image_2.entity_name: Jewish New Yorkers' Gathering at the United Nations
image_2.description: A large gathering of Jewish New Yorkers, many holding Israeli flags, outside the United Nations to grieve and condemn the assault on Israelis, showing a unity that was previously hard to imagine.

image_3.description: The Gaza Strip, a self-governing Palestinian territory bordering Israel and Egypt, with Gaza City as its main urban center, from which Israel called for the evacuation of citizens, signaling a potential escalation in the conflict with Hamas.
Gaza City, a city located within the Gaza Strip, partially overlapping with the area of evacuation, and mentioned as the childhood home of Dr. Arwa el-Rayes.
Israel, a country that borders the Gaza Strip to the east, with a crossing point labeled Erez Crossing, and has a close emotional bond to New York's Jewish community, especially in times of crisis.
